B

BUTTON_ACTION - Variable in class gui.controller.MovingObjectFunctionalityController
the buttonAction of the actual SideControlPane object
buttonAction - Variable in class gui.view.SideControlPane
button to take some action like exit vehicle, sell grain, unload tumpTruck, ...
buttonDisabled() - Method in class gui.view.MenuScene
This method helps to set the button load game disabled or not. e.g. when the game is played for the first time, the button should be disabled as there is nothing to be reloaded.
buttonDown - Variable in class gui.view.SideControlPane
button to move down
buttonLeft - Variable in class gui.view.SideControlPane
button to move left
buttonLoadGame - Variable in class gui.view.MenuScene
button for reloading the old game
buttonRight - Variable in class gui.view.SideControlPane
button to move right
buttonUp - Variable in class gui.view.SideControlPane
button to move up
buyField(GameValue, GameScene) - Method in class gameboard.tiles.FieldTile
This method represents the functionality of the farmer to buy additional fields to the first field in the course of the game.
buyField(GameValue, GameScene, FieldTile) - Method in class gui.controller.MovingObjectFunctionalityController
This method implements the functionality to buy a field at the courtTrade.
